CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_EMAIL_DOC: Enter the email address you registered with Pandora.
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_ONE_DOC: Enable this if you have a Pandora One / Premium account.
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_USE_CURL_302_WORKAROUND_DOC: Rewrite stream URLs to use Pandora server's IP address rather than host name.
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_NEXT_IS_THUMBS_DOWN_DOC: When enabled, pressing the Next button sends a "Thumbs-Down" to Pandora.
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_DUAL_PREVIOUS_FUNCTION_DOC: When enabled, clicking the Previous button replays the track.  When shuffle/random mode is off, another quick click plays the previous track.
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_MAX_STATION_TRACKS_DOC: Plugin will not request song data from current station if this number of songs is reached.
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_FLUSH_ON_STATION_CHANGE_DOC: When enabled, Pandora tracks are flushed on a station change.
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_FLUSH_ON_STATION_CHANGE_LABEL: Flush Pandora tracks on station change.
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_BAND_FILTER_DOC: Enter a %-delimited string of bands you do not want to hear.  For example: Spice Girls%One Direction
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_MQTT_ENABLED_DOC: Send plugin information to MQTT Broker.
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_MQTT_USERNAME_DOC: MQTT Broker Username (leave blank if ununsed).
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_MQTT_PASSWORD_DOC: MQTT Broker Password (leave blank if ununsed).
